c74object.name: orchidea.db.tinySOL
c74object.description: Returns the filename of the tinySOL database.

inlet.description: A bang in the first inlet outputs the path of the tinySOL database

outlet.description: Returns the path of the tinySOL database

method.name: bang
method.description: Returns the path of the tinySOL database.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (bang)
entry.description: Obtain tinySOL database path. A bang in the first inlet outputs the path of the tinySOL database

entry.name: Outlet 1 (symbol)
entry.description: Path of tinySOL database. Returns the path of the tinySOL database
